description: Global functions and macros available throughout the Kairo language

macros.name: reference(T)
macros.description: Creates a reference to a type, same as &T in C++
macros.usage: Can be used as a type like '_: reference(i32)'

macros.name: move_reference(T)
macros.description: Creates an rvalue reference to a type, same as &&T in C++
macros.usage: Can be used as a type like '_: move_reference(i32)'

functions.name: print
functions.description: Prints formatted output to the console, supports multiple argument types all args must be castable to string or char and can be used with endl for custom endlines
